issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: This issue is undergoing QA.  See linked QA issue(s) for progress.
status.name: In QA

fields.description:
This is a negative test, testing VPC requests against an EDGE/Classic mode cloud. 
500 InternalError, logs show Java NPE during 'CreateDhcpOptions' request.
Thanks, 
-M


(sample request using Nephoria/boto in ipython)
from nephoria.testcontroller import TestController
tc  = TestController('10.111.5.162', password='foobar')
user = tc.create_user_using_cloudadmin('testrunner', 'admin')
do = user.ec2.connection.create_dhcp_options() 


Params: {'Action': 'CreateDhcpOptions', 'Version': '2015-10-01'}
2017-04-20 15:07:48,215 boto [DEBUG]:Final headers: {'Content-Length': 0, 'Host': 'ec2.e-15.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com', 'User-Agent': 'Boto/2.34.0 Python/2.7.10 Darwin/15.5.0'}
send: 'GET /?AWSAccessKeyId=AKIAA6U6ME4WBL3FQ532&Action=CreateDhcpOptions&SignatureMethod=HmacSHA256&SignatureVersion=2&Timestamp=2017-04-20T22%3A07%3A48Z&Version=2015-10-01&Signature=Q546XleJ%2FeSNMc0cdGh3i6tPDbkj8mb%2Fpu7SFxwMH9g%3D HTTP/1.1\r\nAccept-Encoding: identity\r\nContent-Length: 0\r\nHost: ec2.e-15.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com\r\nUser-Agent: Boto/2.34.0 Python/2.7.10 Darwin/15.5.0\r\n\r\n'
reply: 'HTTP/1.1 500 InternalError\r\n'
header: Content-Length: 170
header: Content-Type: application/xml; charset=UTF-8
header: Date: Thu, 20 Apr 2017 22:07:48 GMT
header: Server: Eucalyptus/4.4.1

fields.summary: 500 InternalError, Java NPE during 'CreateDhcpOptions' request against EDGE cloud

comments.body: I think this issue also occurs on vpc clouds and may already be fixed in master for 5.0.
This invalid request should fail with a reasonable error as of 5.0.
